name: The Think Tank
description:
It's time for another exciting episode of the hit television show, The Think Tank! And what could be more exciting than that? You're a contestant!

Made for the JamDNA #12 within 96 hours

Controls:

  • Left click to make decisions in the dialogue box and to skip through text.
  • You can press the escape key to quit out of the game during the story.

Game Jam Criteria (minor spoilers):

  • Visual Novel
    • The game is designed as a Visual Novel and operates as such. The main gameplay is choices through the story and is, for the most part, text based.
  • Animals
    • The game is set in a post-human world inhabited by sentient animals. You play a Zebra. The story also features Lions.
  • Extra-Diegetic Music
    • There are three pieces of music that are designed to represent the mood of the environment that they are played in. One quite happy, that hopefully transitions to creepy and two others that are unsettling.
  • Mysterious
    • The game is frequently presenting the player with unusual situations. There is an underlying story that you are tasked with deciphering. before the final reveal.

Follow me for gamedev stuff on Twitter over at: https://twitter.com/RobThomasWhite

or on Instagram at: https://www.instagram.com/robwhitedeveloper/
